Message:
The power of being
believed in by one’s comrades...

That was what we needed
to win the final battle
at Mana Chaos.

so I am positive that same
warm power exists here too.

Since I have seen the power of
the faith placed in you, my lord,

I want to let the same trust
take root among everyone here.

I want it to blossom in their hearts,
just like how those beautiful lilacs
were able to grow in both worlds.

Until the day comes
when the two of us can
talk in your mansion’s
garden once more,

I ask you to please wait
just a little longer.

I may be in
a different world...
and unable to stand
by your side right now,
but I shall make it
back no matter what.

For no matter
where I may be...
I am forever
your secretary, my lord.
